title: Rain check on Christmas
creator_contributor_role: National Heart Foundation of Australia. Victorian Division, funding
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health
abstract: "I was the perfect candidate for a heart attack"
description: A father and his daughter re-tell the events that happened two days before Christmas, when the father was struck down with a heart attack. Made as part of 'The Heart of the Story' in association with Vic Health and the Heart Foundation.
